text: Motion

...Hiori-chan, Meguru-chan, thank you for waiting...
Sorry I'm late...

Not at all!
Your work is important too.

Yeah,
good job on the shoot.
Motion

Is everything okay?... means you pushed it,
so it's not like it's going smoothly.
...yeah

...I talked with the director and the co-star, and I felt
that we were able to create something good together...
Motion
I'm glad to hear that.
The atmosphere, it's totally different from job to job.

Yeah, yeah,
it sounds like a lot of work, but it's rewarding!
Motion
Yeah...

...He has been thinking about how he can make
it easier for people to talk to him...
Motion
What a nice guy!

Fufu....
I feel like that's too easy a judgment.
Motion

We were also able to talk a lot...
About our respective roles... and ────

It's a very, very nice job.
I think it's been a great experience working with them.
...Yeah
Mm-hmm!
Motion

...The other person's thoughts, your thoughts,
and all kinds of other considerations...

...Because we had talked together about "how we feel"
before we started filming the drama...

I also thought a lot about it, and I was able to talk about it
properly with my co-star in depth...
